20110114010855.000|20110114010855.000|CC1|SEVERAL TIMES LAST NIGHT, AND   
20110114010855.000|20110114010857.000|CC1|THIS IS WHAT I GOT, HE SHOWED UP
20110114010857.000|20110114010859.000|CC1|AROUND 6:00 A.M. TO WORK.       
20110114010859.000|20110114010903.000|CC1|HE WENT TO THE SOFT DRINK       
20110114010903.000|20110114010905.000|CC1|MACHINE, HE GOT A COKE OR       
20110114010905.000|20110114010907.000|CC1|WHATEVER I GOT, HE TOOK A FEW   
20110114010907.000|20110114010912.000|CC1|SIPS OUT OF IT, HE LOOKED AT HIS
20110114010912.000|20110114010914.000|CC1|BOSS AND WALKED OUT MUCH THERE
